short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: website resource editor, support edit css, js, json file, support code formating by js-beautify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After installing the plugin, when you access web resources (CSS, JS, JSON) using a browser, an editor preview window will automatically open. The editor preview window supports you to highlight and view code, format JS beauty code, and save editor code to the file system
